title: CSV â†’ CSV Email Extractor (URL or KV store)

csvUrl.title: CSV URL (https://...)
csvUrl.description: If provided, the actor will load the CSV from this public URL.

useKvInput.title: Use Key-Value Store 'INPUT.csv'
useKvInput.description: Enable this to load a file named INPUT.csv from the actor run's Key-Value Store instead of using a URL.

urlCol.title: URL Column Name
urlCol.description: Column name in the CSV that contains the URLs to visit for scraping.

waitMs.title: Page Load Timeout (ms)
waitMs.description: Maximum time in milliseconds to wait for a page to load before timing out.

headful.title: Run in visible browser mode (debug)
headful.description: If enabled, runs the browser in visible (non-headless) mode to observe behavior.

limit.title: Max Rows to Process (0 = all)
limit.description: Limits how many rows will be processed during the run. Set to 0 to process all rows.

force.title: Overwrite existing 'Found Emails' values
force.description: If enabled, the actor will re-process rows that already have email data filled in.
